name: Luminous Edge
description:
Description:
Play as Lumina, the sword of luminary, on its quest to eliminate darkness.

A game made for Ludum Dare 47.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/luminous-edge

Controls:
- AWSD/JIKL : Move
- Z/J: Attack
- X/K: Skill 1
- C/L: Skill 2
- R: Reset
